DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study compare one year treatment program Dialectical Behavior Therapy ( DBT ) + suboxone opiate addict individual meet criterion borderline personality disorder ( BPD ) one year program standard drug counseling ( I/GDC ) + suboxone . Drug counsel consists manualized individual session + group therapy . This trial complete two site , University Washington Duke University . One hundred seventy-two individual ( 86 per condition ) opiate dependence meeting criterion BPD enrol one-year treatment one-year follow-up assessment . Each site ( University Washington , Duke ) enroll 86 client treatment condition conduct site . Assessments measure drug use , suicidal behavior , retention treatment-related behavior , general psychopathology functioning , increase behavioral skill give four month interval entire two year .
